United Center-- as the Detroit Pistons trounced the Chicago Bulls, 110-83. "Thats the most points I've ever scored," Jerry Stackhouse said, who is the NBA's second-leading scorer behind former teammate Allen Iverson . This is the highest level of basketball that you can play and I can say that I did this. It is definitely something I will remember for a long time. And I really think I can do it again. Michael Jordan did most of his prolific scoring in Chicago Stadium prior to his first retirement and never scored more than 55 points in the United Center, which opened in 1994. the unusual things teams are coming up with to defend Michael Vick . "I think we're making good adjustments as players and coaches; I like to do that sooner than later," Reid said. We're getting some unique looks. Everybody has a certain way,[ defensively] that they're playing Michael Vick , and it's not your normal- it's hard to put on another tape and see teams do what they do to Michael Vick , they just change things up and throw you a little bit of a curveball. So you have to make some adjustments. You have to be able to do that. Sunday, the biggest adjustment seemed to be the offensive line finally sorting out the Giants' blitzes, giving Michael Vick a little time and room to work with, especially when he decided to run.
